about_the_game:
VICTORY HANGS IN THE AIR. GRAB IT WITH BOTH HANDS.

It’s the 4th of June, 1942, and Japanese bombs are raining down on Midway – and you. This lethal assault is a prelude to an invasion whose success gives the enemy control over the Pacific. You are one of the American airmen who hold the outcome of this decisive battle in their hands. You’ll have to prove yourself as a fighter, bomber, and reconnaissance pilot, and confront Japanese aces as a bomber and ground AA gunner. The enemy has to be stopped at Midway – and victory’s up to you.

Dive right into spectacular dogfights.
Pilot a variety of fighter, bomber, and reconnaissance planes.

VICTORY HANGS IN THE AIR. GRAB IT WITH BOTH HANDS.

It’s the 4th of June, 1942, and Japanese bombs are raining down on Midway – and you. This lethal assault is a prelude to an invasion whose success gives the enemy control over the Pacific. You are one of the American airmen who hold the outcome of this decisive battle in their hands. You’ll have to prove yourself as a fighter, bomber, and reconnaissance pilot, and confront Japanese aces as a bomber and ground AA gunner. The enemy has to be stopped at Midway – and victory’s up to you.

Dive right into spectacular dogfights.
Pilot a variety of fighter, bomber, and reconnaissance planes.

name: Combat Wings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce (680) or Radeon (X1650)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce (GTX 280) or Radeon (4870)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard

short_description: It’s the 4th of June, 1942, and Japanese bombs are raining down on Midway – and you. This lethal assault is a prelude to an invasion whose success gives the enemy control over the Pacific. You are one of the American airmen who hold the outcome of this decisive battle in their hands.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
